channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Issue is not sorted!!!!, 12th December
item.description:
Nothing has been done Bin is still untouched and there!!!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kingsdale Road, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaves blocking pavement, 12th December
item.description:
The upper part of inverine road has not been swept of leaves in weeks everywhere else’s has and this road always gets missed. It looks awful. It is now slippy and you can’t tell where there is dogs mess please can you sweep this? Thank you.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Inverine Road, Charlton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Failed street light since beginning of December 2025., 12th December
item.description:
This is a "passageway" (Harringay Passage) between Burgoyne Road and Cavandish Road. A failed street lamp makes the footpath less safe and can attract ASB. during dark evenings and night-time.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harringay Passage, Harringay, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Human waste, 12th December
item.description:
There’s human waste by the by 119 lower clapton alleyway near the black gate. Please address this asap as it is affecting the wellbeing of all the residents that access their flats via this alleyway.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clapton Passage, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Super noisy cars revving outside selfridges/oxford street, 12th December
item.description:
Some idiotic drives revving their cars outside for long period of times, honking, revving and making loud scary explosions noise, some don’t seem to have number plates, some are heavily decorated with Christmas lights and put on the show outside Selfridges and while parading Oxford street back and forth

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 421-429, Oxford Street, Mayfair, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet
